languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт одаривает вас долгим изучающим взглядом.{/n} "История детей Азуриана на Лилэтан подходит к концу, но где-то там, среди холодных звезд космоса, что твой вид называет Простором, есть и другие. Лишенные дома. Потерянные. Страждущие..." {n}Эльдарка прикрывает глаза, и скорбь искажает ее тонкие черты.{/n}

{n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт одаривает вас долгим изучающим взглядом.{/n} "История детей Азуриана на Лилэтан подходит к концу, но где-то там, среди холодных звезд космоса, что твой вид называет Простором, есть и другие. Лишенные дома. Потерянные. Страждущие..." {n}Эльдарка прикрывает глаза, и скорбь искажает ее тонкие черты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on Lilaethan is coming to and end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of home. Lost. Miserable..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her chiselled features.{/n}

Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「リラエタンのアシュリアンの御子らの物語は終わりに近づいているが、どこか彼方、お前の種族がエクスパンスと呼ぶ宇宙の冷たい星々の中に、他の者たちがいる。彼らは故郷を奪われ、迷子になり、苦しんでいる…」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じ、その端麗な顔立ちを悲嘆に歪めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「リラエタンのアシュリアンの御子らの物語は終わりに近づいているが、どこか彼方、お前の種族がエクスパンスと呼ぶ宇宙の冷たい星々の中に、他の者たちがいる。彼らは故郷を奪われ、迷子になり、苦しんでいる…」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じ、その端麗な顔立ちを悲嘆に歪めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous étudie attentivement.{/n} « L'histoire des enfants d'Asuryan sur la lilaethan touche à sa fin, mais je sais que quelque part dans l'immensité du cosmos, que vos semblables désignent comme les Étendues, il y a d'autres êtres comme moi. Privés de leur foyer. Perdus. En proie à la souffrance... » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux et un masque de tristesse déforme son visage finement sculpté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous étudie attentivement.{/n} « L'histoire des enfants d'Asuryan sur la lilaethan touche à sa fin, mais je sais que quelque part dans l'immensité du cosmos, que vos semblables désignent comme les Étendues, il y a d'autres êtres comme moi. Privés de leur foyer. Perdus. En proie à la souffrance... » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux et un masque de tristesse déforme son visage finement sculpté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特意味深长地看了你很久。{/n}“阿苏焉之子在莉莱赞的故事即将结束，但在远处，在你们称之为‘科罗努斯扩区’的群星深处，还有很多其他的子嗣。他们失去了家园，身处迷失与痛苦之中……”{n}伊莉耶特闭上了眼睛，精致的面庞满是悲伤之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特意味深长地看了你很久。{/n}“阿苏焉之子在莉莱赞的故事即将结束，但在远处，在你们称之为‘科罗努斯扩区’的群星深处，还有很多其他的子嗣。他们失去了家园，身处迷失与痛苦之中……”{n}伊莉耶特闭上了眼睛，精致的面庞满是悲伤之意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te dedica una larga y atenta mirada.{/n} «Los días de los hijos de Asuryan en el Lilaethan llegan a su fin, pero, en alguna parte de las gélidas estrellas a las que los suyos llaman la Extensión, existen otros más. Les han arrebatado su hogar. No tienen dónde ir. Sufren...». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos y la congoja hace mella en sus esculpidas facciones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te dedica una larga y atenta mirada.{/n} «Los días de los hijos de Asuryan en el Lilaethan llegan a su fin, pero, en alguna parte de las gélidas estrellas a las que los suyos llaman la Extensión, existen otros más. Les han arrebatado su hogar. No tienen dónde ir. Sufren...». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos y la congoja hace mella en sus esculpidas facciones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet mustert dich lang.{/n} "Die Geschichte der Kinder von Asuryan auf der Lileath-Welt nähert sich ihrem Ende. Doch irgendwo da draußen, zwischen den kalten Sternen des Kosmos, die Ihr die Ausdehnung nennt, gibt es noch andere. Ihrer Heimat beraubt. Verirrt. Leidend ..." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen, und Trauer verzerrt ihre feinen Gesichtszüge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}

Doch irgendwo da draußen, zwischen den kalten Sternen des Kosmos, die Ihr die Ausdehnung nennt, gibt es noch andere. Ihrer Heimat beraubt. Verirrt. Leidend ..." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen, und Trauer verzerrt ihre feinen Gesichtszüge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana uzun uzun, incelercesine bakıyor.{/n} "Lilaethan'da Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın hikâyesi sona ermek üzere. Öte yandan dışarıda bir yerlerde, türünün Enginlik adını taktığı evrenin soğuk yıldızlarında daha niceleri var. Yurdundan mahrum kalmışlar. Kaybolmuşlar. Mazlumlar..." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kapatıyor; güzelce yontulmuş gibi duran yüz hattının şekli, kederle bozuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "The tale of the Children of Asuryan on the Lilaethan is coming to an end, but somewhere out there, among the cold stars of the cosmos that your kind calls the Expanse, there are others. Deprived of their home. Lost. Suffering..." {n}Yrliet shuts her eyes, and grief twists her finely sculpted features.{/n}
